awasana ayis yugaya awasan wi minisa palapadiyam wune mita awurudu 10,000 kata peraya .eyin pasu ohu shishta wunayayi nokiyawe.aagam pahala wi hoda naraka kiya deyak gana podu watahimak nama mathrikawa ho athiwi awurudu 3000 k pamana we.inpasu aagamwala namayenda prachanda wiya.langa inna eka nomariya yuthuya yana manasikathwaya athiwi (batahira manawa himikam ) dashaka kihipayakwath gatha wi natha.eheth awurudu laksha ganak minisa jiwath wune kalaye mithya wishwasa hisa dara asimitha prachandathwayakini.meya minisage le mas walama atha.aarakshaka anshawaladi karaliwaladi mathuwanne awignyanaye sangawi athi eliyata paninnata bariwa lathawana ee aashawanuyi.methek eliyata ennata bariwa sangawi thibu ee aashawan santhruptha kara ganne karali ha yuddha waladiya.
ohu ahanne ese kala nam pita pita ohuwa dinewwe , me sareth laksha panas atak chanda dunne ayi kiyaya .
